definitions.definition: A bird having a melodious song or call.
Any bird in the passerine suborder Passeri , which are distinguished by a more sophisticated vocal apparatus .
A person , especially a woman , with a melodious voice .

main_definition: A bird having a melodious song or call.
secondary_definitions: Any bird in the passerine suborder Passeri , which are distinguished by a more sophisticated vocal apparatus .
( idiomatic , by extension ) A person , especially a woman , with a melodious voice .
